Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two neonates suffered from generalized seizures during the course of intravenous morphine sulfate for post - operative analgesia .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| generalized seizures |
| (unspecified) neonatal seizures |
| (unspecified) post-operative condition requiring analgesia |

Note: "neonates" refers to newborn infants, so I assumed "two infants" or "two newborns" were suffering from the mentioned diseases. "Generalized seizures" is a specific type of seizure that affects the entire body, and "post-operative analgesia" is a condition requiring pain relief after a surgical procedure.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| generalized seizures |

Note: "neonates" refers to newborn infants, but it does not directly refer to a disease. "Post-operative analgesia" is a condition, but it is not a disease. Only "generalized seizures" is a specific disease mentioned in the paragraph.
